description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. (http://whipcrackgame.com) WhipCrack lets you assume control of a space-age whip as you crack enemies, earn upgrades, and fling your master across the screen. Battle across 19 single-player missions, and five multiplayer missions. Designed by Scott Peterson, a twelve-year veteran of DreamWorks Animation whose credits include Effects Supervisor for Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa.
